definitions.definition: Any of the muscular - and elastic -walled blood vessels forming part of the circulation system by which blood is conveyed away from the heart regardless of its oxygenation status ; see pulmonary artery .
A major transit corridor in a system of roads , rivers , or railway lines .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) Any of the muscular - and elastic -walled blood vessels forming part of the circulation system by which blood is conveyed away from the heart regardless of its oxygenation status ; see pulmonary artery .
secondary_definitions: ( transport ) A major transit corridor in a system of roads , rivers , or railway lines .
